CQ1.query: What is the average salary of instructors in departments with a budget greater than the average budget of all departments?
CQ1.sql: SELECT AVG(i.salary) AS avg_salary FROM instructor i JOIN department d ON i.dept_name = d.dept_name WHERE d.budget > (SELECT AVG(d2.budget) FROM department d2);

CQ2.query: Show the total budget and the count of instructors for each department.
CQ2.sql: SELECT d.dept_name, COUNT(i.name) AS instructor_count, d.budget FROM department d LEFT JOIN instructor i ON d.dept_name = i.dept_name GROUP BY d.dept_name, d.budget;
